Title: Accelerated procedure
Description: The time limit for the receipt of bids or requests to participate is less than the prescribed minimum time limit.

Title: Electronic auction
Description: The procurement method involves electronic auction.

Title: Joint procurement
Description: The buyer is a centralized purchasing body
column4: or there are two or more buyers.

Title: Optionally negotiated procedure
Description: The buyer may award contracts on the basis of the initial bids without negotiation.

Title: Successive stages
Description: The number of bids to be negotiated or solutions to be discussed are reduced in successive stages of the procedure.
